title: Good but not great
review: This movie didn't do justice for Black Panther while it was an ok movie it was boring at best and predictable, but I didn't expect much from Marvel on this one they seam to have trouble on origin movies (Cap America the first Avenger and Thor 1 and some what Thor 2 as well they were boring also). Well I hope we get a Black Panther 2 with a better villain and no family drama.
